en.live: Whether the Rumble stream is currently live
en.viewers: Current number of concurrent viewers watching the stream
en.joined: Total viewers that have joined the stream session
en.title: Current stream title
en.reactions: Current reaction count on the stream
en.followers: Current follower count of the channel
en.subs: Total paid subscriptions/memberships for the channel
en.sub_gifts: Gifted subscriptions/memberships received during the stream
en.rants: Number of Rants received this stream
en.rant_amount: Total value of Rants received this stream
en.chat_members: Active chat members in the livestream chat
en.language: Language reported by Rumble for the stream
en.chat_url: Direct URL to the livestream chat
en.channel_image: Avatar image URL for the Rumble channel
en.started_at: Timestamp of when the stream went live (ISO 8601)
en.scheduled_start: Scheduled start time for the stream (ISO 8601)
